profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on IT infrastructure, Linux systems, automation, and operations. While it mentions 'new technologies' and 'expanding systems and platforms', it lacks specific details about AI, machine learning, or generative models. The core responsibilities align more with traditional IT engineering and system administration rather than specialized AI roles like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it is not primarily an AI-focused technical role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure' implies software development activities related to infrastructure and platform enhancement.
job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'ensuring excellent operations' and 'carrying out life cycle management of systems and software', which are core aspects of operations engineering.
The phrase 'carrying out life cycle management of systems and software' directly relates to the operational management of systems throughout their lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software

job_tasks.justification: The mention of working with 'Delivery & contract managers, Product Leads and Project managers' and understanding the 'demand side' indicates a need to align technical work with business stakeholders and needs.
job_tasks.phrase: work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Leads and Project managers and the demand side

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate well within team and with other colleagues
carry projects from the start to a maintainable solution including knowledge sharing
communication and coordination skills are developed well
decide how, what and when you learn
keep your manager and colleagues informed of your goals and progress
challenge people in a positive way
